body:
`vet` is intended to check issues of correctness. The difference between using `fmt.Errorf` or `errors.New` here is clearly one of style since they are semantically equivalent. This should be an issue to file at [golang/lint](https://github.com/golang/lint/issues), which is intended to check issues of style. I just checked and it doesn't seem like `golint` complains about this case.

I'm going to close this, but feel free to open the issue on the `lint` tracker.
